import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { collection, getDocs, deleteDoc, doc, addDoc } from 'firebase/firestore'; import { db } from '../Firebase/firebase'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import '../index.css' import withReactContent from 'sweetalert2-react-content'; const MySwal = withReactContent(Swal); const Examen = () => { const [nombrereal, setnombrereal] = useState('') const [nombredevillano, setnombredevillano] = useState('') const [edad, setedad] = useState('') const [afiliacion , setafiliacion] = useState(null) const [descripcion, setdescripcion] = useState(null) const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const [villanos, setVillanos] = useState([]) const productsCollection = collection(db, "Heroes") const navigate = useNavigate() const store = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await addDoc(productsCollection, { nombrereal: nombrereal, nombredevillano: nombredevillano, edad: edad, afiliacion: afiliacion, descripcion: descripcion, archienemigo: archienemigo.poderes }) window.location.href = window.location.href; window.location.replace(''); } const [archienemigo, setarchienemigo] = useState({ poderes: [], res: [], }) const handleChange = (e) => { const { value, checked } = e.target const { poderes } = archienemigo; if (checked) { setarchienemigo({ poderes: [...poderes, value], res: [...poderes, value] }) } else { setarchienemigo({ poderes: poderes.filter((e) => e !== value), res: poderes.filter((e) => e !== value), }) } } const getProducts = async () => { const data = await getDocs(productsCollection) setProducts( data.docs.map((doc) => ({ ...doc.data(), id: doc.id })) ) } const deleteProduct = async (id) => { const productDoc = doc(db, "Heroes", id) await deleteDoc(productDoc) getProducts() } const confirmDelete = (id) => { MySwal.fire({ title: 'Â¿Quieres eliminar este Registro?', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#d33', cancelButtonColor: '#3085d6', confirmButtonText: 'SI!' }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { deleteProduct(id) Swal.fire( 'Eliminado!', ) } }) } useEffect(() => { getProducts() }, []) return (
